= PROPOSED MESSAGE FORMAT =
ContactSwap:COMMAND:TAG:Data:TAG:Data...:

COMMAND -> Query, Response

TAG -> Name, Phone, NotFound

= For example: =

===The Search===
ContactSwap:Query:Name:Rob McColl:

===Results if Found===
ContactSwap:Response:Name:Rob McColl:Phone:2054220909:

===Results if Not Found===
ContactSwap:Response:Name:Rob McColl:NotFound:
